system.effect: Any Melee Hits against wearer cause attacker to suffer 1d5+1 R Damage (can be dodged/parried), if spikes are on arms, wearer counts as having a Knife. Decrease Armour Availability by 1

description.value: Any Melee Hits against wearer cause attacker to suffer 1d5+1 R Damage (can be dodged/parried), if spikes are on arms, wearer counts as having a Knife. Decrease Armour Availability by 1
